Square Chikwanda (a mụrụ n'afọ 1972) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe, nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Harare, Zimbabwe
O bu ụzọ mụta nka ya site n'aka nna ya, onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe.
A mụrụ ya na Mvurwi, Chikwanda kwagara Tengenenge Sculpture Community na nna ya mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa
N'ebe ahụ, nna ya kụziiri ya mgbe ọ dị obere ịsa na ịcha nkume
Ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ma mụta nka nke ihe ọkpụkpụ iji bụrụ onye na-ese ihe oge niile mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, na-emepe ụdị nke ya
N'obodo ha, o nwere ọtụtụ ụmụ akwụkwọ, nke Jonathan Mhondorohuma ghọrọ ezigbo enyi
N'afọ 1993, ọ hapụrụ obodo ahụ gaa rụọ ọrụ na Harare na Chapungu Sculpture Park
N'ogige a, Square gara n'ihu na-agbasawanye nkà ya, nke mere ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị isi na-akpụ ihe na Harare
Square ugbu a (2006) na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya na Chitungwiza, nke dị na Harare. E gosipụtala ọrụ ya n'ụwa niile.
Ihe ọkpụkpụ Square na-ahụkarị ihe osise na ụmụ anụmanụ dịka ọmụmaatụ

"Blind Portrait", Berlin, Germany ma ọ bụ "Hippo", Tengenenge, Zimbabwe.  Ọnụ ọgụgụ ya n'ozuzu ya dị oke square na ejiji: ogwe aka, ụkwụ na mkpịsị aka na-abụkarị square ma na-egosi akara siri ike; imi nwere mma dị nkọ
Ihe ọkpụkpụ ya na-echetara n'ezie ihe osise nka nke 1930-1940 ma a na-achacha ya mgbe niile ruo ogo zuru oke
Ọ na-eji nkume Zimbabawean nke obodo, nke gụnyere springstone.
